#The beginnings of a wiki-fied manual for EnFloSW

= Introduction =

EnFloSW is a flexible multi-purpose data acquisition suite written in NI LabVIEW. At its heart is "Measurement.vi", which takes, and ensemble averages, blocks of data. Physical DAQ devices are abstracted, 
making it possible to code for most hardware.
